attributes.background: I want the parliament to make school lunches more healthy and with a bigger variation like adding fruit pots to the school menue and instead of fizzy drinks flavours water.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar action: 

Remove Sugary Foods from School Menus in England to Promote Children's Health
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702272

Review quality of school food
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702413
